Posts.Content: My diagnosis was a punch in the gut like I've never felt before.  I've learned a lot going through 6 rounds of chemo, surgery, and now radiation and continued chemo.  Lots of side effects but can be managed if you know what to expect.  The nurses and the ACS website were great but found some other sources to help.  Happy to share or answer any questions you might have.  It's all still really fresh in my mind.
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to

Posts.Content: I'm new to the network but thankfully heading into the home stretch on my treatment.  Joined for the very same reason.  Luckily, I've been feeling great since my pathology results but having "reality moments" when I think about everything that has happened in the past eight months.  Would love to chat.
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to
